aboutText1: Hurricane Agatha striked the southern Coast of Mexico in May 30th, 2022, touching land in the state of Oaxaca at 2:30 p.m. Central Time.
aboutText2: It was categorized under category 2 of the Saffir-Simpson scale. It reached maximum speeds of 165 kilometers per hour (approx. 102 mph), at times increasing to 205 kilometers per hour (127 mph).
